description.default:
Good morning/ afternoon.  My name is ____________.  I am from TIFA Research, an independent research organization.  I do not represent the government or any political party.  We are studying the views of citizens in Kenya about issues that affect their lives. Some of the questions will relate to your household or the household you presently live in. A household is a group of people who presently eat together from the same pot. 

The interview will take approximately 1 hour but you have the option of doing it in 2 sessions of 30 minutes each, if thatâ€™s the case, you shall inform us on the convenient day and time to contact you. All information that you share with us will be kept confidential.

description.default: Letâ€™s begin by recording a few facts about you.

elements.name: Q12.1
elements.title: Q12.1. Have you heard of the Building Bridges Initiative (BBI)?

elements.name: BBI
elements.title: In March last year, President- Uhuru Kenyatta and the Opposition Leader- Raila Odinga met and in a public display had a â€˜handshakeâ€™ and agreed to work together and address the divisions that have always arisen after elections in Kenya through an initiative known us the Building Bridges Initiative (BBI)

title.bg: 12. Je unaunga mkono ama huungi mkono hoja la BBI
title.de: 12. ingira iyie aisaport arashu imingira asaport BBI?
title.pl: 12. Miyaad taageereysaa ama ma taageersan tahay mashruuca BBI?
title.default: 12.	Do you support or donâ€™t support the BBI initiative?

title.bg: 13. Je unaamini mpango huu wa BBI utapatanisha na kuleta â€˜Kenya mpyaâ€™?
title.de: 13. Idolita iyie enaa keshuunyie ena BBI neyau olosho lekenya tenebo neyau Kenya ngejuk?
title.pl: 13. Miyaad aamminsan tahay in tallaabada BBI ay dalka dib u heshiisiinayso oo ay keeni doonto 'Kenya cusub'?
title.default: 13.	Do you believe that the BBI initiative will reconcile the country and bring about a â€˜new Kenyaâ€™?

title.bg: 14. Je unaamini kuwa wanasiasa kutoka kaunti yako wanaunga mkono ama hawaungi mkono hoja la BBI ya Rais na Raila Odinga ya kupatanisha nchi na kuleta â€˜Kenya mpyaâ€™?
title.de: 14. Idolita iyie enaa kengira isiasani lekaunty inyi isaport arashu imengira isaport BBI nreuta orais o Raila Odinga pee echuunyie olosho neyau Kenya ngejuk?
title.pl: 14. Miyaad aamminsan tahay in siyaasiyiinta ka soo jeeda gobolkaaga ay taageersan yihiin ama aysan taageerin hindisaha BBI ee uu soo saaray Madaxweynaha iyo Raila Odinga si ay u heshiisiiyaan dalka una keenaan 'Kenya cusub'?
title.default: 14.	Do you believe that the politicians from your county support or donâ€™t support the BBI initiative by the President and Raila Odinga to reconcile the country and bring about a â€˜new Kenyaâ€™?

text.pl: Midkoodna ha taageero ama ha taageerin

title.bg: 15. Rais na Raila Odinga walitoa muhtasari wa maswala TISA ambayo wangependa hoja la BBI ishughulike nayo ili kuleta â€˜Kenya Mpyaâ€™. Je unaweza kutaja yoyote kati ya maswala hayo TISA ambayo unaweza kukumbuka, kama kunayo
title.de: 15. Ore Orais o Raila Odinga neshomo apa itau ibaa naudo naayiu nelo BBI inguraa pee etumokini atayu â€˜Kenya kenjukâ€™ tolikioki nabo enena baa naudo nidamu,tenaa ketii
title.pl: 15. Madaxweynaha iyo Raila Odinga waxay soo saareen qodobo ay ka mid yihiin NINE oo ay jeclaan lahaayeen in barnaamijka 'BBI' uu wax ka qabto marin-habaabinta si loo keeno 'Kenya cusub'.  Miyaad magacaabi kartaa wax ka mid ah arrimaha NINE ee aad xasuusan karto, haddii dhan?
title.default: 15.	The President and Raila Odinga outlined NINE issues that they would like the BBI initiative to deal with in order to bring about a â€˜new Kenyaâ€™. Can you name ANY of the NINE issues you may recall, if at all?

elements.name: Read
elements.title: [INTERVIEWER! PLEASE READ TO THE RESPONDENT THE NINE ISSUES THEN ASK]

title.bg: 16. Je, unaamini masuala TISA yaliyoelezwa katika mchakato(process) wa BBI, ikiwa yatashugulikiwa vya kutosha, yatapatanisha nchi na kuleta â€˜Kenya mpyaâ€™?
title.de: 16. Iyamini iyie anjo ore kuna baa nauudo natii BBI tnegurari itobiraki  naa kepuo itutum olosho neyau Kenya tenebo?
title.pl: 16.  Ma aaminsan tahay in arrimaha NINE sida ku xusan howlaha BBI, haddii si habboon wax looga qabto, ay dalka la qabsan doonaan oo ay keeni doonaan 'Kenya cusub'?  / Je, unaamini masuala TISA yaliyoelezwa katika mchakato wa BBI, ikiwa yatashugulikiwa vya kutosha, yatapatanisha nchi na kuleta 'Kenya mpya'?
title.default: 16. Do you believe that the NINE issues as outlined in the BBI process, if adequately addressed, will reconcile the country and bring about a â€˜new Kenyaâ€™?

elements.name: Q17

title.bg: 17. Ukifikiria kuhusu Kenya kwa ujumla, je kuna suala au masuala mengine ya ziada ambayo hayajumuishwa kati ya TISA ambayo unaamini mchakato (process) wa BBI unafaa kuzingatia ili kupatanisha na kuleta â€˜Kenya mpyaâ€™?
title.de: 17. Amaa tenedamu iyie Kenya telulungata,ketii ebaye nanarikino nebonikini kuna naudo niyamini iyie anjo pee eimaki BBI tekishuunoto olosho neyau Kenya ngenjuk  tolikioki obaka uni
title.pl: 17. Markii aad ka fikirtid Kenya guud ahaan, ma jiraan arrimo dheeri ah ama arrimo aan lagu darin NINE oo aad u maleyneyso in nidaamka BBI uu wax ka qaban doono dib u heshiisiinta iyo keenista 'Kenya cusub'?  Soo xigto illaa SADAD arrimood oo dheeri ah haddii aad awoodid.  / Ukifikiria kuhusu Kenya kwa ujumla, je kuna suala au masuala mengine ya ziada ambayo hayajumuishwa kati ya TISA ambayo unaamini mchakato wa BBI unafaa kuzingatia ili kupatanisha na kuleta 'Kenya mpya'?
title.default: 17.	Thinking about Kenya as a whole, is there any additional issue or issues not included among the NINE which you believe the BBI process should address in reconciling and bringing about a â€˜new Kenyaâ€™? Mention up to THREE additional issues if you may.

elements.name: Q19.1

title.bg: 19.1. Tarehe 27 wa Novemba mwaka uliopita, Rais Uhuru Kenyatta na Raila Odinga walizindua ripoti ya BBI Katika Bomas. Kufuatia kuzinduliwa huo, kumekuwa na mjadala wa umma kuhusu mambo ambayo iko ndani ya ripoti hiyo. Je umesikia nini, iwapo kuna chochote, kuhusu ripoti hiyo?
title.de: 19.1. Ore tolapa letomon oobo ledaari otulusoyie,neterua apa Orais Kenyatta o Raila Odinga BBi tebomas e Kenya. Ore esuju ina kiterunoto,etii apa ororei sapuk ole otusujua ina kiterunoto. Kanyoo itoningi iyie naipirta ina report?
title.pl: 19.1. Bishii Nofeembar 27, sanadkii hore, Madaxweyne Uhuru Kenyatta iyo Raila Odinga waxay warbixintii BBI ka fureen Bomas-ka Kenya.  Soo-qaadista kadib, waxaa jiray doodo dadweyne oo ku saabsan waxyaabaha ka soo baxa warbixinta.  Maxaad maqashay, haddii ay jiraan, oo ku saabsan warbixinta?
title.default: 19.1.	On November 27 last year, President Uhuru Kenyatta and Raila Odinga launched the BBI report at the Bomas of Kenya. Following the launch, there has been public debate about the contents of the report. What have you heard, if any, about the report?

title.bg: 20. Zifuatazo ni kauli ambazo watu wamesema  kuhusu ripoti ya BBI iliyozinduliwa na Rais Uhuru Kenyatta na Raila Odinga tarehe 27 wa Novemba mwaka wa 2019. Ni kauli gani inakaribia zaidi maoni yako?
title.de: 20. Ore kuna naa ibaa naimaki iltunganack naipirta enkiterunoto BBI naiterua Orais Uhuru Kenyatta o Raila Odinga tolapa letomon oobo 27,2019 kanataaniki ituat inonock
title.pl: 20. Kuwa soo socdaa waa hadalada ay dadku ka dhiibteen warbixintii BBI ee ay soo saareen Madaxweyne Uhuru Kenyatta iyo Raila Odinga 27-kii Noofembar, 2019. Bayaankee ayaa u DARAN aragtidaada?
title.default: 20.	The following are statements people have made regarding the BBI report launched by President Uhuru Kenyatta and Raila Odinga on November 27, 2019. Which statement is CLOSEST to your view?

text.bg: Nimeridhika kwa jumla na yaliyomo kwenye ripoti ya BBI
text.de: Itosheke nanu too baa naipirta BBI
text.pl: Waxaan guud ahaan ku qanacsanahay waxa kujira warbixinta BBI
text.default: I am generally satisfied with the contents of the BBI report

text.bg: Ninahitaji kufahamishwa yaliyomo kwenye ripoti ili kutoa uamuzi mwafaka
text.de: Kayiu naitayiolo kewon inena baa pee atumoki
text.pl: Waxaan u baahanahay in la iiga warbixiyo waxa ku jira warbixinta si aan u gaaro go'aan xog ogaal ah
text.default: I need to be sensitized on the contents of the report to make an informed decision

text.bg: Mtazamo wangu kuhusu ripoti hayajalishi, viongozi watafanya uamuzi wa mwisho
text.de: Imenjalisha anjo idiat ainei ilariko oyamuwa
text.pl: Macno malahan fikradaheyga kujira warbixinta, hogaamiyeyaasha ayaa gaari doona go'aanka ugu dambeeya
text.default: It does not matter what my perspectives are on the report, the leaders will make the final decision

text.bg: Bora kiongozi wangu anakubaliana na yaliyomo kwenye ripoti, nitafuata uamuzi wa kiongozi wangu
text.de: ore akeyie etonyorayie olarikoni lai inena baa natii BBI ,nasunj iduat olarikoni lai
text.pl: Ilaa iyo inta hogaamiyahaygu oggol yahay waxa ku jira warbixinta BBI, waan raaci doonaa go'aanka hogaamiyadayda
text.default: As long as my leader agrees to the contents of the BBI report, I will follow the decision of my leader

description.bg: Kwa sasa ningependa kuzungumza kuhusu Building Bridges Initiative (BBI)
description.pl: Hadda waxaan jeclaan lahaa inaan u sii gudbo si aan ugala hadlo Dhismaha Buundooyinka Initiative
description.default: I would now like to move on to talk about the Building Bridges Initiative (BBI)

title.bg: 21. Nitasoma kauli mbili sasa. CHAGUA KAULI A AU KAULI B. Je, ni kauli gani iliyokaribia mtazamo wako?
title.de: 21. kalo isuma ibaa ore . CHAGUA KAULI A AU KAULI B./kaa nabo nataaniki iduat inonock ?
title.pl: 21. Waxaan aqrin doonaa labo qoraal.  XULASHADA XAALADAHA AMA HALKA B. Waa kuwee weedhaha ugu dhow aragtidaada?
title.default: 21.	I will read out two statements.  CHOOSE STATEMENT A OR STATEMENT B. Which of the statements is closest to your view?  Do you agree or strongly agree?

text.bg: A. Ninahisi mshikamano wa Kenya uko katika utofauti (kwa mshikamano tunamaanisha mchanganyiko wa kikabila na kidini)
text.de: A. Kanikito nanu anjo ore naboisho ekenya ketii ewooro(ore tenaboisho naa eshula ekanisa odinii)
text.pl: A. Waxaan dareensanahay in awoodda Kenya ay kujirto kala duwanaanshaheeda (kala duwanaan waxaan u jeednaa isku dhafnaan xagga isirka iyo diinta ah)
text.default: A. I feel that Kenyaâ€™s strength is in its diversity (by diversity we mean both ethnic and religious mixtures)

text.bg: B. Ninahisi utofauti ulioko unaleta shida (kwa utofauti tunamanisha mchanganyiko wa kikabila na kidini)
text.de: B. Kanikito anjo ore eworo natii na keyau enyamali. (ore tenaboisho naa eshula ekanisa odinii)
text.pl: B. Waxaan dareensanahay in kala duwanaanta Kenya ay keento dhibaatooyin (kala duwanaanta waxaan ula jeednaa isku dirka qowmiyadeed iyo diintaba)
text.default: B. I feel that Kenyaâ€™s diversity brings problems (by diversity we mean both ethnic and religious mixtures)

text.bg: Ninajihisi kuwa Mkenya kidogo kuliko miaka mitano iliyopita
text.de: kaningito mara olekenya tiatua ilarin imiet otulsoitie
text.pl: Waxaan dareemayaa inay ka yar yihiin dadka reer Kenya maanta sida aan dareemay 5 sano ka hor
text.default: I feel less Kenyan today than I felt 5 years ago

text.bg: Hakuna tofauti ya jinsi ninavyojihisi Mkenya tangu miaka mitano iliyopita
text.de: imeeta ingibelekenyat ara okenya tiatua ilarin imiet otulusoitie
text.pl: Majiro wax farqi ah oo ku saabsan sida aan dareemayo inaan ahay reer Kenya ilaa shan sano kahor
text.default: There is no difference on how I feel as a Kenyan since five years ago

text.pl: Weligey ma dareemin sidii qof reer Kenya ah
text.default: I have never felt like a Kenyan

text.bg: Kugawa rasilimali ya umma kwa njia ya usawa
text.pl: Wadaag hantida dadweynaha si caddaalad ah

text.bg: Kupunguza idadi ya vyama vya kisiasa

title.bg: 35. Pamoja na mapendekezo mengine katika ripoti ya BBI ni mapendekezo ya kuongeza bajeti inayotumwa kwa serikali za kaunti hadi kati ya asilimia 35 na asilimia 45 wa mapato ya seriklai yaliyokaguliwa mara ya mwisho. Je unaunga mkono kabisa , unaunga mkono kiasi, ama hauungi mpango wa kuongeza bajeti inayotumwa kwa serikali za kaunti?
title.de: 35. Amaa kulie baa natii BBI ketoponayie budget ocounti itabaya 35% anaa 45% tengata apa nabayieki.ingira  kasaport peno arashuu kasaport eponaroto omali tesirkali ecounti?
title.pl: 35. Waxyaabaha kale ee soo jeedinta ah ee ka soo baxa warbixinta BBI waxaa ka mid ah soo jeedinta in la kordhiyo qoondaynta miisaaniyada loogu talagalay dawladaha gobollada illaa inta u dhaxaysa 35% iyo 45% dakhligii ugu dambeeyay ee la xisaabiyay.  Miyaad si buuxda u taageertaa, xoogaa u taageersantahay ama ma u taageersantahay tallaabada lagu kordhinayo qoondaynta miisaaniyad ee loogu talagalay maamullada gobollada
title.default: 35.	Among other proposals in the BBI report is the proposal to increase budget allocation to county governments to between 35% and 45% of the last audited national revenue. Do you fully support, somewhat support or not support the move to increase budget allocation to the county governments?

title.bg: 38. Hivi majuzi, serikali ya kaunti ya Nairobi ilihamisha baadhi ya kazi zake na kupea serikali kuu. Je unaunga mkono kabisa, unaunga mkono kiasi ama huungi mkono jinsi serikali ya kaunti ya Nairobi ilihamisha baadhi ya kazi zake na kupea serikali kuu?

title.pl: 38. Dhawaan, dowladda gobolka Nairobi ayaa qaar ka mid ah shaqooyinkeeda u dirtay dowladda qaranka.  Miyaad si buuxda u taageeraysaa, xoogaa u taageersantahay ama uma taageersantahay tallaabada ay gobolka Nairobi u qaadayso sidii ay hawlaheedii ugu wareejin lahayd dowladda qaran?

text.de: A. Ore tenakata ingopirr esirkali naa kengira aitau ingotoi sidain naa puo aishungie enyamali.
text.pl: A. doladha sfcn ayey mashikilaha udahdahadisaa markaa mashakilaheno doladha ayan ugesanaa
text.default: A:  Since government institutions provide adequate avenue for resolving problems that matter to me, I usually raise it with them to resolve my problems

text.bg: B. Kwa sababu taasisi za serikali hazitoi njia bora ya kutatua shida zilizo muhimu kwangu, huwa natumia njia nyingine kutatua shida zangu.
text.de: B. Ore tenakata naa imengira ikopirt esikali atau ingotoi anapuo aishunyieena nyamali.
text.pl: B. doladhaa hadey sfcn udadahalinin mashakilaheno;wax yalo kle oo mashakilaheno kuhalino isticmalnaa
text.default: B: Since government institutions DO NOT provide adequate avenue for resolving problems that are important to me, I usually seek alternative methods of resolving my problems

elements.description: CHOOSE STATEMENT A OR STATEMENT B.
